ygData.subject: Server Wars~~
ygData.msgSnippet: Good to see lots of activity here!! I joke about Xev, because i RARELY see anyone on a board from Xev posting anything. Here s an addicts question, how many
ygData.messageBody:
Good to see lots of activity here!! I joke about
Xev, because i RARELY see anyone on a board from Xev
posting anything. Here's an "addicts" question, how many
characters do you have, on how many servers????<br><br>As
for hunting options -- what class/race are you and on
what continent?? Grouping is ALWAYS good after level
5. Try to get into full groups in CB, or in
Steamfont by the mino caves, or in BB at any one of the
many camps. Full groups give a 20% XP bonus!!! It
makes the game, USUALLY, more fun to play, also.
<br><br>Anyone got some 411 on OOT and Kunark?? I have never
been to either, and am wanting to
adventure.<br><br>Xela<br>Druid of the 17th season
